mapper.select:
SELECT dc.id, dc.`name`, dc.env_id envId, dc.domains, dc.valid_from, dc.organization_id, dc.valid_until, dc.command_id, cmd.`status` commandStatus, cmd.command_type commandType, cmd.error error, dc.status FROM devops_certification dc LEFT JOIN devops_env AS de ON env_id = de.id LEFT JOIN devops_env_command cmd on dc.command_id = cmd.id WHERE 1=1
AND de.project_id = #{projectId}
AND dc.env_id = #{envId}
AND dc.organization_id = #{organizationId}
AND
dc.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{certName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND
de.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{envName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND
dc.domains LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{domain, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
AND (dc.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR de.`name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') OR dc.domains LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{param, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%'))

SELECT * FROM devops_certification dc left join devops_env de on dc.env_id = de.id WHERE `status` = 'active' AND de.project_id = #{projectId} AND de.cluster_id = #{clusterId} AND domains LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%"', #{domain, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'"%')
mapper.update: UPDATE devops_certification dc set dc.skip_check_project_permission = #{skipCheckPro} where dc.id = #{certId}
